Reviews.Title: Not the camera shown
Reviews.Author: Jack B.
Reviews.Content: This is the cheap and crappy version of the muvee mini camera.  At an inflated price. The better versions have a metal housing and slide switches, which are very important for basic operation ot the camera.  The push switches on the cheaper versions have no way to verify the operation and the camera settings are difficult to know.  If you want the cheaper version, don't buy this one.  They are available for much less than this ad.  This seller appears to be trading on the photo, which is deceptive.  Not recommended.Also, this is not "Signstek", it is a no-name version.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: Wouldn't even turn on. The lights flashed but it would always turn back off. I wouldn't buy this. That's all.

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Ted Soqui Photography
Reviews.Content: Signstek sent me a new and fully functional replacement MD80 Mini DV DVR video recorder, free of charge. The new camera works fine and is a deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Definitely some problems
Reviews.Author: djs1lv06
Reviews.Content: While the camera works quite well, the clip broke off on my first use.  This makes it virtually unusable until I can figure out how to improvise another way to stick  it on my door post.  I was actually looking for something more "covert" so I could catch vandals messing around with my cars.

Reviews.Title: Update Mini DV DVR
Reviews.Author: Patrick L. Provencio
Reviews.Content: It has taken time to figure out how to use this item because the instructions are not very good.  I believe the instructions were translated from another language and not very well.  After much time testing, it does work.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: mcjwm "shelly"
Reviews.Content: Works great. My husband loves this! This is a good buy for the money. Our kids even like it too.

Reviews.Title: my sd card
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: I did not get my sd card with my order I need the sd card it will change my rating

Reviews.Title: GOT MORE THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Fred J. Morgan "Jeff Morgan"
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this DVR. it is true 720. The manual - like most Chinese manuals is horrible SO this is the UPDATE I made...[...] Like the Keyless Entry DVR I purchased from these guy...  I am very happy.. and I don't give my praises away...  Like the other DVR I shot a video without the instruction simply by turning on and pressing start button... plug it in.. device installs, opens folder... their is video.... Again not good lighting so quality was not perfect BUT better AGAIN than my Samsung Galaxy Proclaim phone in 720 mode.What was IMPRESSIVE was the packaging...  this little camera came with everything!  Mounts (Clip, Magnetic, screw down) a moisture proof cover, usb cable, Carry strap, fold out prong AC usb charger, Micr SD dongle, Nice Instruction Book, Micro-CD with driver and Manual..... All very nicely packaged.. For a VERY REASONABLE PRICE...  I WAS TAKEN BACK... HIGHLY RECOMMEND...
